Bootstrap your startup

Expertise

Here are some of the tasks our team can do for you

Backend

We can develop the REST API for you backend. We use a backend stack based on Apache Camel and Elasticsearch.

Frontend

We can develop the frontend of your prototype. We use a frontend stack based on Bootstrap, AngularJS, JQuery.

Mobile

We can develop an initial version of your mobile application using Apache Cordova and Ionic.

Search

We can implement fulltext search for your solution using Elastic Search.

Analytics

We can help you analyse your data or develop self-improving services based on classification technology such as Elastic Search, Weka, Knime

Analytics

We can help you analyse your data or develop self-improving services based on classification technology such as Elastic Search, Weka, Knime
